name: Bonkersland
startIntroPart1: Crazy things are heppening, such as the beginning of Bonkersland. The place of crazy things.
startIntroPart2: You, as Madman Banana Boy, know what to do. It's banana time.
declaringWar: You are now going to explode.
attacked: Try me! The other nations will shudder when they find your discombobulated, dismembered, decomposing capital when I'm done with ya!
introduction: Who are you? Who are you!? WHO ARE YOU!?
neutralYes: Just the right amount of silly.
afterPeace: Wait, we were fighting? Totally forgot, honestly.

name: Hellscape
declaringWar: You area fiend and a crook! We must strike you down!
attacked: You swine! We will show you why you do not mess with us!
defeated: And the ever-bleeding German-Russian city state finally dies...
